description:
See ALL the hottest stories about your favorite sports & teams! Fanzo delivers the top trending news and social media from 1000+ sources in one app.

By keeping track of the articles & posts getting shared and discussed the most on social media, Fanzo sorts through the clutter and finds the stories that are truly hot with millions of sports fans. No editors, no hidden agendas, no bias. Fanzo is WHERE FANS RULE!

On top of providing the best news, Fanzo is a place for connecting with fellow fans in the social sports world. See hot takes from influential fans, build up your Fanzo score by posting and interacting with sports content, and climb the weekly leaderboard to be an ultimate fan!

Includes all major American professional and college sports, European football & much more. Personalize the app with your favorite teams to get notifications whenever a story goes viral.

Get Fanzo and get in the loop!

--

Check out what sports fans are saying about Fanzo:

“I love it. Brings me information on my team and favorite sports from different places like Bleacher Report, NFL.com, ESPN.com, even YouTube videos.” - Mrguyser

“App is off the charts with all the news it delivers…” - sgwilliejac

“This app is a pleasure to use. Instead of finishing work and checking Twitter, having to sift through 99 irrelevant tweets for every one relevant one, I can get it all in the one place. Top app!” – Kingshott

--

Have feedback about Fanzo? Email feedback@fanzo.me
trackCensoredName: Fanzo - Top Trending Sports News, Rumors, Analysis & Social Media

releaseNotes:
• Update your push notification preferences under "Notification Settings" in the side menu
• Crash issues affecting some Fanzo users have been resolved
• Minor bug fixes & performance improvements
